topic: Priority 1 complete, Priority 2 planning: Knowledge Graphs
findings: Priority 1 (Hands manifest system) is FULLY COMPLETE: schema.mjs (HAND.json validator), registry.mjs (manifest loader + lifecycle: activate/pause/resume/deactivate), runner.mjs (multi-phase LLM executor with Ollama+Claude fallback, Telegram notify, checkpoint tracking), cli.mjs (CLI), and 4 production HAND.json manifests (learner, researcher, forge-miner, forge-trainer). State persisted to state.json. CRAAP evaluation on Priority 2 (Knowledge Graphs): 4.6/5 — strongly recommended. Current RAG: 638 flat chunks, cosine similarity only. Gap: no entity extraction, no relationship mapping, no graph traversal. Plan: (1) brain/rag/graph.mjs — entities + relationships tables, LLM entity extraction, co-occurrence relationships, BFS traversal; (2) modify ingest.mjs to extract entities per chunk; (3) extend index.mjs with graphSearch() hybrid mode. Entity types: person, project, repo, task, tool, concept, org. Relationships via co-occurrence weight + typed patterns.
